message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000, which reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.

Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $18,000 is significantly higher than you're willing to pay.  I'm willing to come down to $15,000.  I believe this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still looking for something closer to my budget. I am willing to pay $12,000 for it.
